sentences.en: "Actually, most of my tennis is at club level," he admitted.
sentences.cn: “说实话，我的网球基本上属于业余水平，”他承认说。

sentences.en: Actually, on second thoughts, I don’t think I want to go out tonight.
sentences.cn: 其实再想想，我今晚不打算出去了。

sentences.en: Although this recipe looks long, it is actually very quick to prepare.
sentences.cn: 尽管这个菜谱看上去很长，其实做起来很快。

sentences.en: Anna tried to look interested. Actually, she was bored stiff.
sentences.cn: 安娜努力装出感兴趣的样子。实际上，她腻烦透了。

sentences.en: He actually became convinced that the nurses had an unanswerable case.
sentences.cn: 他实际上已经相信了护士们的情况确实如此。

sentences.en: He captained the team but he didn't actually play.
sentences.cn: 他是球队的队长，但实际上却并未上场。

sentences.en: He will actually be serving three concurrent five-year sentences.
sentences.cn: 实际上，他将服3个5年徒刑，合并执行。

sentences.en: I actually knew her, but in overalls I passed unrecognised.
sentences.cn: 实际上我认识她，但是我身着工作服，与她擦身而过的时候却没被认出来。

sentences.en: I can't give you details because I don't actually have any details.
sentences.cn: 我没办法给你提供细节，因为我并不了解任何细节。

sentences.en: I would be surprised, actually, if he left Birmingham.
sentences.cn: 如果他要离开伯明翰，说真的，我会很惊讶。

sentences.en: I’ve known Barbara for years. Since we were babies, actually.
sentences.cn: 我认识芭芭拉很多年了，实际上我们从小就认识。

sentences.en: In some perverse way the ill-matched partners do actually need each other.
sentences.cn: 奇怪的是，那些不相配的伴侣实际上却彼此需要。

sentences.en: It was actually used for enriching uranium to weapons-grade levels.
sentences.cn: 实际上，它是用来将铀浓缩以制造武器。

sentences.en: Motorways actually cover less than 0.1 percent of the countryside.
sentences.cn: 高速公路的实际覆盖面积还不到农村地区的0.1%。

sentences.en: Neil's colleagues say he was actually in a joking, upbeat mood.
sentences.cn: 内尔的同事们说他实际上在说笑逗乐，心情不错。

sentences.en: Terry actually says "Oh, shucks!" when complimented on her singing.
sentences.cn: 人们赞誉她的歌声时，特里实际上会说“噢，没什么!”

sentences.en: They actually moved down from upstairs because the rent's that expensive.
sentences.cn: 他们确实从楼上搬到了楼下，因为房租太贵了。

words.tran_cn: 真实的，实际的；现行的，目前的
成为现实；发挥出潜力（等于actualize）
实行；使成现实；发挥出…的潜力

trans.tran_cn: 的确，事实上，（口语）说实在的
trans.tran_en: used to add new information to what you have just said, to give your opinion, or to start a new conversation
